subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay Rays outfielder B. J. Upton was suspended two games and fined an undisclosed amount by Major League Baseball on Saturday for launching into a tirade following an ejection earlier last week.
snippet: Tampa Bay Rays outfielder B. J. Upton was suspended two games and fined an undisclosed amount by Major League Baseball on Saturday for launching into a tirade following an ejection earlier last week.
